# byValue

**Instance Property**

Defines the value the receiver uses to perform relative interpolation.

## Declaration

```swift
var byValue: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CABasicAnimation#Setting-Interpolation-Values] for details on how `byValue` interacts with the other interpolation values.

## Interpolation values

- **fromValue**: Defines the value the receiver uses to start interpolation.
- **toValue**: Defines the value the receiver uses to end interpolation.
